h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard
content: If you try to retreat from the second combo, be warned that he can slice the bloody water to form waves of force as projectile slices with three hits, so you’ll need to keep dodging either way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
If you try to retreat from the second combo, be warned that he can slice the bloody water to form waves of force as projectile slices with three hits, so you’ll need to keep dodging either way.
